recipe.title: Green Sauce No. 4
ingredients: 2 cups cilantro leaves with tender stems
instructions: Pulse miso, lemon juice, lime juice, oil, tahini, vinegar, and honey in a food processor or a blender until miso is dissolved and mixture is smooth. Add cilantro, chives, ginger, and coriander and pulse until herbs are finely chopped; season with salt and pepper.

Pulse miso, lemon juice, lime juice, oil, tahini, vinegar, and honey in a food processor or a blender until miso is dissolved and mixture is smooth. Add cilantro, chives, ginger, and coriander and pulse until herbs are finely chopped; season with salt and pepper.
Do Ahead Sauce can be made 3 days ahead. Cover and chill.
Sauce can be made 3 days ahead. Cover and chill.
